par.name: ele
par.note: Required. An Element reference or an ID string of the element to be centered. It must have absolute position.

par.name: rel
par.note: Optional. If !rel then ele will be centered relative to the viewport. If rel===true then ele will be centered relative to its offsetParent (which should have either relative or absolute position). Else rel is assumed to be an Element reference (or an ID string of an element) relative to which ele will be centered.
